title: Viral Ass Whooping, Biz Markie, Steve's Sports, Sex In Tokyo and more.
itunes:title: Viral Ass Whooping, Biz Markie, Steve's Sports, Sex In Tokyo and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Who is Steve talking to? The CLO addresses a situation involving COVID and the babysitter. Pastor Motown makes it clear that he speaks two languages. Congrats to LBJ on having the #1 movie in the country. Right here we get Bitterman showcasing his darkness and he also tells us a free form cussing story. Steve filled in for Junior and gave us his Sport's report. Something violent and funny happened in Detroit. Tokyo has a thing for cardboards. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about God having a design for all of us.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
